name: Gothic 2
description:
Gothic 2 is an action-RPG game developed by Piranha Bytes. It was originally released in 2002. JoWooD Productions published the game. Gothic 2 has a Metascore of 79, based on professional reviews. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
You can play Gothic 2 on PC.
Kai Rosenkranz scored the game.
